revised_title: The Minute Anatomy of the Alimentary Canal and Fat-Absorption
tldr: The author examines the minute anatomy of the alimentary canal, focusing on the mucous membrane and the process of fat-absorption. The research reveals the role of the reticulum in fat absorption and the structure of the villi and their associated muscles. The study provides insights into the complex processes of digestion and nutrient absorption in the gastrointestinal tract.
